Unfortunately, yes. In the past, people have created social media campaigns that mocked and belittled individuals who were overweight or obese. These campaigns often spread misinformation, stigma, and shame towards people with higher weight.

In the early 2000s, there was a popular campaign called "Fatkini" which aimed to shame and ridicule people with higher weight by Photoshopping them into bikinis. The idea was that if you looked good in a bikini, you were considered attractive and worthy of attention. If not, then you must be fat and ugly.
